org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint

类 PendingCheckpointStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.AbstractCheckpointStats
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.checkpoint.PendingCheckpointStats
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PendingCheckpointStats
extends AbstractCheckpointStats
    Statistics for a pending checkpoint that is still in progress.

    This is the starting point for all checkpoint tracking. The life cycle of instances of this class is tightly coupled to a PendingCheckpoint instance, which forwards statistics about acknowledged subtasks via reportSubtaskStats(JobVertexID, SubtaskStateStats).

    Depending on whether the PendingCheckpoint is finalized successfully or aborted, we replace ourselves with a CompletedCheckpointStats or FailedCheckpointStats and notify the CheckpointStatsTracker.

    The statistics gathered here are all live updated.

    另请参阅:

    • 构造器详细资料

      • PendingCheckpointStats

        PendingCheckpointStats(long checkpointId,
                       long triggerTimestamp,
                       CheckpointProperties props,
                       int totalSubtaskCount,
                       java.util.Map<JobVertexID,TaskStateStats> taskStats,
                       CheckpointStatsTracker.PendingCheckpointStatsCallback trackerCallback)
        Creates a tracker for a PendingCheckpoint.
        参数:
        checkpointId - ID of the checkpoint.
        triggerTimestamp - Timestamp when the checkpoint was triggered.
        props - Checkpoint properties of the checkpoint.
        totalSubtaskCount - Total number of subtasks for the checkpoint.
        taskStats - Task stats for each involved operator.
        trackerCallback - Callback for the CheckpointStatsTracker.

        Reports statistics for a single subtask.
        参数:

        subtask - The statistics for the subtask.
        返回:
